repositories.name: MvvmCross
repositories.label: first-timers-only

repositories.label: good first issue

repositories.name: Uno Platform
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: OSS project for creating pixel-perfect, single-source C# and XAML apps which run natively on iOS, Android, macOS, Linux and Web via WebAssembly.

repositories.name: Cake
repositories.label: Good-first-issue
repositories.description: Cake (C# Make) is a free and open source cross-platform build automation system with a C# DSL for tasks such as compiling code, copying files and folders, running unit tests, compressing files and building NuGet packages.

repositories.name: Spectre.Console
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: A .NET library that makes it easier to create beautiful console applications.

repositories.name: TEAMMATES
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: TEAMMATES is a free online tool for managing peer evaluations and other feedback paths of your students.

repositories.name: elasticsearch
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: Open Source, Distributed, RESTful Search Engine.

repositories.name: JabRef
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: Desktop application for managing literature references using modern Java features including JavaFX. Dedicated to code quality and constructive feedback: Each Pull Request is reviewed by two developers to provide high-quality feedback and to ensure high quality of new contributions.

repositories.name: Wikimedia Commons Android App
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: Allows users to upload pictures from their Android phone/tablet to Wikimedia Commons.

repositories.name: XWiki
repositories.label: onboarding
repositories.description: XWiki is a free wiki software platform written in Java with a design emphasis on extensibility. Beginners should follow the onboarding wiki.

repositories.name: zerocode
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: API Automation without coding, easy JSON response assertions, Testing REST, SOAP, Kafka and Java/DB APIs, CI/Jenkins Friendly.

repositories.name: Trino (formerly Presto SQL)
repositories.label: good first issue
repositories.description: A distributed SQL query engine for big data. Ask for guidance on project's Slack.
